name: do-it-redux
description: Redux library code for the DoIt serverless application

scripts.new-tag: git push && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.major: npm version major && npm run new-tag
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm run new-tag
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run new-tag
scripts.major-clean: npm install && npm run major && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.minor-clean: npm install && npm run minor && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.patch-clean: npm install && npm run patch && rm -rf node_modules

author: Andrew Wittrock
